projects.title: Algorithms
projects.description: Bunch of algorithms exercises that I've solved by using C language during graduation.

projects.title: Data Structures
projects.description: Data structures such as binary trees, pointers, dynamic memory altype, recursion, etc.

projects.title: Design Patterns
projects.description: Some design patterns I've studied/used during graduation, done with Java.

projects.title: Solar Tracker
projects.description: Solar Tracker built with a 3d Printer, using solar panels and servos. Code written in Arduino.

images.alt: Project finished with it's pieces assembled

projects.title: Renewable Energy Fund App
projects.description: This project is based on the idea of creating a renewable energy investment app and was made within 48hrs using React Native, Expo, Redux, TypeScript and Styled-components.

projects.title: FugaPet
projects.description: I've used mostly React Native, Expo, Styled Components to build the mobile application, Firebase for functions and Cloud Firestore Database for the back, Git and Gitlab for version control.

projects.title: Qualicorp
projects.description: One of the leading, full-service healthcare benefits administrators and health management services providers in Brazil. I've used mostly Node.js to develop and maintain the countless API's available in a microservices architecture, Neo4j and Oracle SQL database, Vue.js for the front-end, Azure for pipelines and TFS/Git for repo/version control.

projects.title: Full Stack CRUD Test
projects.description: CRUD test using Node.js, Vue.js and NEO4J. It has been a rush trying to migrate from React to Vue and also learning a new graph database such as Neo4j, but it all worth the effort in the end.

projects.title: Manager/Technician/Tasks API
projects.description: API integration exercise built from scratch in order to study and use Node.js, MySQL, Redis, Docker and Kubernetes.

projects.title: NLW Timeline
projects.description: A timeline with your moments. Built with React, Next, Next Auth, Prisma, TailWindCSS, Expo, Typescript, Node, Fastify and Vercel.

projects.title: Promptopia
projects.description: A follow-in a class project that I am doing with Next.js and Google Auth that allows people to sign in and share AI prompts to use.

images.alt: Home page listing the latests prompts

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This very own page, built with Next.js, TypeScript and TailwindCSS only.
